page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Bovey and Hennock are the two residential areas here.We live in nice houses.In the olden days they used to live in wooden houses.We have brick houses.Flats have about 15 floors,houses have an upstairs and downstairs,bungalows have only a downstairs.Houses are quite expensive in this area because a lot of people like to live near Dartmoor.A 3 bedroomed semi-detached house on an estate could cost between Â£30,000 and Â£40,000.The older houses around here have been renovated.In Hennock one of the houses was mentioned in the Domesday Book.It is now for sale at Â£125,000.Devon house,once a home for naugty young ladies.Is now flats.Devon house was built in 1865 and has 26 flats. They sell for about Â£28,ooo each.Some of the houses in this area are owned by the council.
